ballot_activity_list.title: Activity connected to the tracking code

AffidavitRejectItem.author: Election Official
AffidavitRejectItem.details: Your affidavit has been rejected. Please contact your Election Officials office to cure your affidavit.

AffidavitAcceptItem.author: Election Official
AffidavitAcceptItem.details: Your affidavit has been accepted. A new item will appear here when it has been extracted for tallying.

VoterSessionItem.author: You
VoterSessionItem.details: You have authenticated your self and signed in.

tracker.cancel_cross_label: Cancel and track a new ballot

info.title: Ballot found
info.description: See the status of your ballot below. You can also see all activity connected to your ballot tracking code.

found.title: Ballot received
found.description: Your ballot package has been received. Check back to verify that your ballot was accepted for counting.

accepted.title: Ballot accepted
accepted.description: Your signature affidavit has been verified and your ballot is accepted for counting.

rejected.title: Ballot not accepted
rejected.description: There is a problem with your signature affidavit. Contact your local election official for next steps and to cure your affidavit.

extracted.title: Ballot decrypted for tallying
extracted.description: Your ballot has been extracted from the digital ballot box and decrypted offline. It has been printed onto a paper ballot for scanning and tabulation with other absentee ballots.

welcome.footer: Did you mean Ballot Check instead?
welcome.locate_tracking_code: Where do I find my tracking code?

about.p1: I have voted and I want to track my ballot.
about.p2: To check the status of your ballot, you need to input the tracking code from the Voter receipt.

error.title: Tracking code not found
error.content: Please check that the tracking code was entered correctly. The code is case sensitive. If you are checking to make sure your ballot was recorded correctly before submitting, use the ballot check site instead. Still having problems? Contact your local election official.
